title: User login success with valid credentials
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in with valid username/email and password credentials, and is redirected to the correct dashboard based on role.

steps.description: Navigate to user login page
Enter valid user email and password
Click on login button
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to the user dashboard

title: Admin login success with valid credentials
description: Verify that an admin can successfully log in with valid credentials and is redirected to the admin dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate to admin login page
Enter valid admin username and password
Click on login button
Verify admin is authenticated and redirected to the admin dashboard

title: User login failure with invalid credentials
description: Verify that login fails with invalid credentials and appropriate error message is displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to user login page
Enter invalid email and password
Click login button
Verify login fails and error message is shown

title: Route protection prevents unauthorized access
description: Verify that protected routes redirect unauthenticated users to login page and restrict access based on role.

steps.description: Attempt to navigate to user dashboard without login
Verify redirect to login page occurs
Login as user
Attempt to access admin dashboard
Verify user cannot access admin dashboard and is either redirected or shown access denied

title: Explore batches loads and displays batch list with details
description: Verify that the Explore Batches page loads successfully and displays the list of available batches with detailed information.

steps.description: Login as authenticated student user
Navigate to Explore Batches page
Verify that batches are listed with correct information such as batch name, start date, and enrollment options

title: Enroll in batch triggers proper enrollment and updates My Batches
description: Verify that enrolling in a batch updates the user's enrolled batches and reflects accurately in the My Batches page.

steps.description: Navigate to Explore Batches page
Select a batch and click enroll button
Verify enrollment confirmation is shown
Navigate to My Batches page
Verify enrolled batch appears with correct progress details

title: View personal enrolled batches and progress
description: Verify that the My Batches page displays all enrolled batches and their progress accurately for the logged-in user.

steps.description: Login as student user with enrolled batches
Navigate to My Batches page
Verify all enrolled batches are listed with progress status

title: Course content navigation through subjects and chapters
description: Verify navigation inside a batch shows subjects and chapters correctly and users can drill down to chapter level content.

steps.description: Navigate to My Batches page
Select an enrolled batch
Verify subject list is displayed
Select a subject and verify chapter list is displayed
Ensure correct navigation hierarchy and data is displayed at each level

title: Video player playback and controls functionality
description: Verify that the integrated video player in ChapterView plays lecture videos smoothly with working play, pause, seek, and volume controls.

steps.description: Navigate to a chapter with video content
Start video playback
Verify video plays smoothly without errors
Use pause control and verify video pauses
Seek to different position in the video and verify playback
Adjust volume and verify changes

title: Access and download PDFs and DPPs without errors
description: Verify that related PDFs and Daily Practice Problems (DPPs) are accessible from course content and can be downloaded successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to chapter or subject view with supplementary materials
Click on a PDF or DPP link
Verify that PDF/DPP content loads or downloads correctly without errors

title: Quiz loads correctly and user responses are recorded
description: Verify that quizzes for course content load properly, accept user answers, and submit responses accurately.

steps.description: Navigate to quiz associated with a chapter
Verify quiz questions display correctly
Answer quiz questions
Submit quiz responses
Verify that responses are recorded and quiz result or confirmation is displayed

title: Admin creates new batch successfully
description: Verify that an admin can create a new batch using the CreateBatch page and it appears in the batch list afterwards.

steps.description: Login as admin user
Navigate to Create Batch page
Fill in batch creation form with valid data
Submit batch creation form
Verify batch is created successfully and visible in batch listings

title: Admin manages content with EditableDropdown functionality
description: Verify that admin can edit and manage batch/course content using the ManageContent page and EditableDropdown component works as expected.

steps.description: Login as admin user
Navigate to Manage Content page
Use EditableDropdown to update content selections
Save changes
Verify that content updates persist and reflect correctly

title: Profile displays current user information
description: Verify that the Profile page loads and displays accurate information of the logged-in user.

steps.description: Login as student user
Navigate to Profile page
Verify profile information such as name, email, and settings are displayed accurately

title: User updates profile information successfully
description: Verify that user can update profile details and changes are saved and reflected correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to Profile page
Edit profile fields such as name or preferences
Save profile changes
Verify that updates succeed and are displayed after save

title: Batch exploration shows appropriate empty state when no batches available
description: Verify the Explore Batches page displays an appropriate message or UI when no batches are available for enrollment.

steps.description: Ensure no batches are available in backend
Navigate to Explore Batches page
Verify appropriate empty state or message is displayed

title: Application routing handles invalid URLs gracefully
description: Verify that navigating to invalid or non-existent URLs results in appropriate 404 or fallback pages without crashing the app.

steps.description: Navigate to an invalid URL in the application
Verify that 404 or Not Found page is displayed and no dead ends occur

title: Quiz handles incomplete or invalid user input correctly
description: Verify that the quiz interface properly handles incomplete submissions or invalid input and provides proper feedback to the user.

steps.description: Navigate to a quiz and leave some questions unanswered
Attempt to submit quiz
Verify system prompts for unanswered questions or handles incomplete answers gracefully

title: Critical pages load within performance thresholds
description: Verify that key pages (Home, Dashboard, Chapter View) load and become interactive within acceptable time limits (e.g., under 3 seconds) to ensure optimal user experience.

steps.description: Navigate to Home page and measure load time
Navigate to Dashboard and measure load time
Navigate to a Chapter View and measure load time
Verify all measured load times are under 3 seconds
